keywordReminderTexts.reminder: During friendly turns, you can move me through empty spaces, to any space along my diagonal. This counts as moving as many spaces as I can.
During friendly turns, I can spend a space of movement and give myself -X E to move myself through X Ethereal characters.
You can destroy a Memory attached to me. Echo me.

When I die, annihilate me.
During friendly turns, you can pip revive me at half cost.
When I'm hand->discarded, discard->cast a DIFFERENT Crazy Idea for 1 pip.
When this character dies (while I'm equipped), rehand me.
When turns start, move an adjacent character 1 space, then I attack them.
When friendly turns start while there's a friendly Sportsball augment, discard->cast me.
Can't be cast normally.
While I'm inactive, I can't attack or move.

When I fight, kill me.
When another character arrives adjacent to a Supplicant:

When a non-Weather character arrives here, apply the listed effect.
When turns start, deck->cast a Weather Condition adjacent to me, then annihilate me.

Summon me only in Weather overlap.
When I'm summoned during an enemy turn, each Weather Condition I'm in does this to each card in it:
Hand->summon a Weather Event in that Weather Condition's overlap with another Weather Condition.
A character is martyred when they die during an enemy turn.
When I'm summoned, or when turns start, move me 1 space.
Discard your deck's top card until you discard an appropriate character. Revive them.
You can pip discard->cast me, then annihilate me.
When turns start, swap me for a Wanderer in your deck with less S. (They won't wander until next turn.)
I can move during enemy turns. (Otherwise, the same rules apply as normal: nothing must be happening, I must have enough N, etc.)
Must be played in Water, but doesn't have to be played adjacent to a friendly card.
When nothing is happening, if I'm not in Water, kill me.
After I move in a straight line by something other than this effect, move me 1 space in the same direction.

Can only be attached to a character not already wielding an Instrument.
After Music is cast adjacent to me, delay until the stack ends. Dispel it.
When this character defends, attach me to your Avatar.
When nothing is happening and I'm adjacent to fewer than that many friendly characters, I die.
Northeast, northwest, southeast, or southwest.
When a character kills this character, attach me to the killer.
Annihilate me. Hand->summon a Mech Golem where I was and activate it. When it dies, summon me where it was and negate me until the next turn starts.
Can move through cards.
The first time each stack I'm activated, pulse adjacent characters. (Activate, then deactivate each.)
When I'm summoned, I attack an adjacent W X enemy. Give them -X W until the battle ends. This uses my attack for the turn.
When I attack, hand->discard X cards. Give me +2X W until the battle ends.
Once per turn, pay 1 pip to give -X E to an enemy on the board.
When enemy turns start, choose a space in Shade. If it gets lit up this turn, move/swap me with anything there. Once everyone has unstealthed, I attack an adjacent enemy character.
keywordReminderTexts.technicalReminder: When enemy turns start, choose a space in Shade. If Light arrvies encompassing it this turn, move me there, swapping me with any card already there. After the stack ends, I attack an adjacent enemy character, if I can.

keywordReminderTexts.reminder: The first time each round I fight a W X character, give them -X W for that fight.
If there's no appropriate cards here, dispel me.
